Bundles > General > osgi.bnd

The pom files of skysail bundles usually have a similar layout the main sections of which are described here in more detail:

The parent pom:

An example osgi.bnd file 

Import-Package: com.thoughtworks.xstream.annotations;resolution:=optional,\
 org.codehaus.jackson.annotate;resolution:=optional,\
 org.codehaus.jackson.map.annotate;resolution:=optional,\
 org.apache.commons.lang,\
 *;resolution:=optional
Export-Package: de.twenty11.skysail.common;version="0.2.0",\
 de.twenty11.skysail.common.app;version="0.1.0",\
 de.twenty11.skysail.common.filters;version="0.0.1",\
 de.twenty11.skysail.common.grids;version="0.3.0",\
 de.twenty11.skysail.common.forms;version="0.2.0",\
 de.twenty11.skysail.common.responses;version="0.3.0"
Bundle-SymbolicName: skysail.common
Include-Resource: {maven-resources}
